response.overview: Rachel Watson, devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day, until one morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds.
response.tagline: What you see can hurt you.
response.title: The Girl on the Train

results.name: Emily Blunt Sees Something Intimate - Extended Preview
